Ah, I misread on the sleeve thing. I roll sleeves when it gets a little warm or when I'm working with my hands. If you're going to roll sleeves just make sure that you aren't ending up with a massive cuff. YouTube should help with that.
As long as your shorts fit correctly and they're only a little above the knee, no one is going to be seeing much of your thigh. If you want to play it safe then buy a pair that hits the knee and cuff them to see if you like them shorter.
